text:
"The Invisible Man" is an American-Australian 2020 Science fiction horror movie written and directed by Leigh Whannell. It is about a woman who believes she is being stalked by her abusive and rich boyfriend even after his suicide. The movie stars Elisabeth Moss, Aldis Hodge, Storm Reid, Harriet Dyer, Michael Dorman, and Oliver Jackson-Cohen.
"The Invisible Man" was released in the United States on February 28, 2020, by Universal Pictures to strong positive reviews.
